abstract: NBA negotiators and players' union plan third straight day of labor talks; players, who have been seeking a 53 percent share, down from the 57 percent they earned under the last labor deal, are expected to respond after the meeting.
snippet: Only eight hours after Tuesday’s marathon negotiating session, N.B.A. and players union representatives worked through much of the day Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Only eight hours after Tuesday’s marathon negotiating session, N.B.A. and players union representatives worked through much of the day Wednesday.

headline.main: N.B.A. Talks Break Off for the Night
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Talks Go Long for 2nd Straight Day
headline.seo: N.B.A. Labor Talks Go Long for a Second Day
